div.p: E.R., D.H., R.J., K.D. and M.R. designed the study. I.W. and W.D. coupled the models. E.R. performed the model simulations, processed the data and performed the analyses. I.W. calculated the EP fluxes. E.R. wrote the manuscript with substantial input from D.H., R.J., I.W., W.D., J.U., J.C., K.D. and M.R. All authors discussed the results and reviewed the manuscript.
